message.raw:
Waits now have labels you give them when you request them.
Acquisitions can also specify that they are to take place during a wait.
In this case their start and end times will be interpreted with the beginning
of the wait as zero. This might mean that the acquisition ends up getting
no data at all, if the wait is short. But so be it.

This relied on chunking of data to be done in BLACS, which it still hasn't been.
